document_data.name: Miranda
document_data.mainbody: '''Miranda''' was a merchant in [[Luskan]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
document_data.Description: Around [[1487 DR]], Miranda was elderly, with grey hair and sunken skin.
document_data.Relationships:
She was friendly with the Dead Rats gang and owed them a few favors. Her usual contact in the gang was [[Titus Minton]].

She was also on good terms with [[Aleema Meddlebrook]], an old herbalist friend of hers.
document_data.History: Miranda sold a number of items to members of the [[Order of the Burning Dawn]] in Luskan.
